channel.title: Critique on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Critique on Konigi

item.title: Draftboard: Design Review Tool
item.description: Draftboard is a wireframe and visual design review web app for capturing design reviews of your work. http://www.draftboardapp.com

item.title: Bounce: Screenshot annotation service
item.description: Bounce is a new screen capture service from Zurb that lets you invite other collaborators to annotate screenshots. Here's a test page of Konigi for you to defile, er, test. http://www.bounceapp.com/
